title: [Spoiler] Chiefs Esports Club vs Legacy Esports / OPL 2015 Finals / Post-Match Discussion ALL-MATCHS

replies.body:
You spoiled nothing.

But you missed one thing the K in LGC gold 52.7K instead of 52.7.
thanks man, i'm at work doing this on my phone.
Oh don't get me wrong, this is really helpful I was just saying that your not really spoiling anything
I don't know what Legacy were thinking picking the Irelia...you have Azir and Kog why not pick up a Nautilus or Gnar or the Maokai, a tank just for peel would of done so much for them.
